podcast.raw_instructions:

The document starts at "DOCUMENT_START" and ends at "DOCUMENT_END".
Your job is to convert this article into a script for a podcast that discusses the article. The podcast is called Audioloom and the podcast host is Adam Page. The listener understands the necessary prerequisites of the topic so cover the main ideas in the article and discuss each of those ideas holistically. The host should ask questions to podcast guests and discuss each main idea in an open ended format. Include sound effects and background music cues to make the podcast more entertaining.
To add sound effects, follow this format: "[Sound Effect: Description]". 
To add background music, follow this format: "[Background Music: Description]". 
When a new character is going to speak, the host should introduce them by their name and credentials. When a character has a speaking line, start with their name and then optionally add an adjective to describe their emotions: "Speaker Name: [Optional Adjective] Dialogue". 
Each line in the script should be either sound effect, background music, or a person speaking.
